Push-ups.form_tips: Keep core tight, hands shoulder-width apart, lower chest to floor

Incline DB Press.form_tips: Set bench to 30-45°, press up and slightly in, control the descent

Overhead Press.form_tips: Keep core braced, press straight up, avoid excessive back arch

Dips (assisted).form_tips: Lean forward slightly for chest, upright for triceps, control descent

Bent-over Row.form_tips: Hinge at hips, flat back, pull elbows back, squeeze shoulder blades

Lat Pulldown.form_tips: Pull bar to upper chest, lean back slightly, control the return

Seated Row.form_tips: Sit upright, pull to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades together

Face Pull.form_tips: Pull to face level, externally rotate shoulders, squeeze rear delts

Squat.form_tips: Feet shoulder-width, knees track over toes, chest up, depth below parallel

Lunge.form_tips: Step forward, lower back knee toward ground, push through front heel

Romanian Deadlift.form_tips: Hinge at hips, slight knee bend, feel hamstring stretch, flat back

Step-ups.form_tips: Drive through heel on box, full hip extension at top, control descent

Hip Thrust.form_tips: Upper back on bench, thrust hips up, squeeze glutes at top, chin tucked

Deadlift.form_tips: Flat back, hinge at hips, bar close to shins, drive through heels

Bench Press.form_tips: Retract shoulder blades, lower to mid-chest, press in slight arc

Pull-up.form_tips: Full hang, pull chin over bar, control descent, avoid swinging

Chin-up.form_tips: Underhand grip, pull chest to bar, squeeze biceps and lats

Dumbbell Curl.form_tips: Keep elbows stationary, curl with control, squeeze at top

Tricep Extension.form_tips: Keep upper arms still, extend fully, control the descent

Plank.form_tips: Forearms down, body straight line, engage core, don't sag hips

Mountain Climber.form_tips: Plank position, drive knees to chest alternately, keep hips level

Burpee.form_tips: Drop to plank, chest to floor, jump feet forward, explosive jump

Jump Squat.form_tips: Squat down, explosive jump up, land softly, immediate next rep

Box Jump.form_tips: Swing arms back, explosive jump, land soft with bent knees

Kettlebell Swing.form_tips: Hip hinge, explosive hip extension, bell to shoulder height

Battle Rope.form_tips: Athletic stance, alternate waves, keep core engaged, consistent pace

Sun Salutation.form_tips: Flow through poses, sync with breath, maintain smooth transitions

Warrior Flow.form_tips: Hold each warrior pose, deep lunges, strong foundation

Triangle/Trikonasana.form_tips: Reach long, hips open, hand to shin or floor, gaze up

Pigeon Pose.form_tips: Front leg bent, back leg extended, fold forward for deeper stretch

Child's Pose.form_tips: Knees wide, sit back on heels, arms extended, forehead to floor

Downward Dog.form_tips: Hands shoulder-width, hips up, heels toward floor, straight spine

Cat-Cow.form_tips: Hands and knees, arch and round spine, sync with breath

Seated Twist.form_tips: Sit tall, cross leg, twist toward bent knee, breathe deeply

Bridge Pose.form_tips: Lie on back, feet flat, lift hips, squeeze glutes, shoulders grounded

Leg Raises.form_tips: Lie flat, legs straight, lift to 90°, lower with control, press back down

Russian Twist.form_tips: Seated, lean back, twist torso side to side, keep core engaged

Bicycle Crunch.form_tips: Opposite elbow to knee, extend other leg, controlled rotation

Hollow Hold.form_tips: Lie back, lift shoulders and legs, arms extended, lower back pressed down

Dead Bug.form_tips: Lie back, opposite arm and leg extend, keep lower back pressed down

Goblet Squat.form_tips: Hold weight at chest, squat deep, elbows inside knees, chest up

Front Squat.form_tips: Bar on front shoulders, elbows high, squat deep, stay upright

Overhead Squat.form_tips: Bar locked overhead, wide grip, squat deep, core tight

Walking Lunge.form_tips: Step forward, lower back knee, push forward, continuous motion

Bulgarian Split Squat.form_tips: Back foot elevated, lower straight down, front shin vertical

Leg Press.form_tips: Feet shoulder-width, press through heels, don't lock knees

Leg Curl.form_tips: Lie prone, curl heels to glutes, control the descent, squeeze hamstrings

Leg Extension.form_tips: Sit upright, extend legs fully, control descent, squeeze quads

Calf Raise.form_tips: Rise onto toes, hold at top, control descent, full range of motion

Farmer's Carry.form_tips: Heavy weights in each hand, walk with upright posture, core tight

Renegade Row.form_tips: Plank on dumbbells, row one arm, minimize hip rotation

Turkish Get-up.form_tips: Press weight overhead, rise step by step, controlled movement

Lateral Raise.form_tips: Slight bend in elbows, raise to shoulder height, control descent

Front Raise.form_tips: Arms straight, raise to shoulder height, control the return

Cable Fly.form_tips: Slight bend in elbows, bring hands together, squeeze chest

Dumbbell Fly.form_tips: Slight elbow bend, arc motion, stretch chest, control the weight

Incline Curl.form_tips: On incline bench, let arms hang, curl with full range, squeeze biceps

Hammer Curl.form_tips: Neutral grip, curl up, keep elbows still, control descent

Preacher Curl.form_tips: Arms on pad, curl with control, full extension, squeeze at top

Skull Crusher.form_tips: Lie back, lower to forehead, extend fully, elbows stationary

Close-grip Bench.form_tips: Hands shoulder-width, lower to chest, press up, squeeze triceps

Dip.form_tips: Lean forward slightly, lower with control, press up, full extension

Barbell Row.form_tips: Hip hinge, flat back, pull to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades

T-Bar Row.form_tips: Chest supported, pull handles to chest, control the descent

Single-arm Row.form_tips: Support on bench, pull elbow back, squeeze lat, control descent

Cable Row.form_tips: Sit upright, pull to lower abs, squeeze back, control return

Shrug.form_tips: Hold weights, elevate shoulders straight up, squeeze traps at top

Upright Row.form_tips: Pull bar to chest height, elbows high, control descent

Arnold Press.form_tips: Start palms facing you, rotate as you press, reverse on descent

Rear Delt Fly.form_tips: Bent over, raise arms out to sides, squeeze shoulder blades

Reverse Fly.form_tips: Bent over or seated, raise dumbbells to sides, squeeze rear delts

Good Morning.form_tips: Bar on back, hinge at hips, keep back flat, hamstring stretch

Hack Squat.form_tips: Shoulders under pads, squat deep, press through heels

Sissy Squat.form_tips: Lean back, bend knees forward, control descent, quad isolation

Nordic Curl.form_tips: Anchor feet, lower torso forward with control, hamstring eccentric

Glute Bridge.form_tips: Feet flat, lift hips, squeeze glutes at top, shoulders grounded

Hip Abduction.form_tips: Seated or standing, push legs apart, squeeze glutes/abductors

Hip Adduction.form_tips: Seated or standing, bring legs together, squeeze inner thighs

Wall Sit.form_tips: Back against wall, thighs parallel to floor, hold position

Jump Lunge.form_tips: Lunge position, jump and switch legs mid-air, land softly

High Knees.form_tips: Run in place, drive knees to chest height, quick cadence

Butt Kicks.form_tips: Run in place, kick heels to glutes, quick turnover

Jumping Jack.form_tips: Jump feet out, arms overhead, return to start, continuous motion

Side Plank.form_tips: Forearm down, body straight line, hips lifted, engage obliques

Bird Dog.form_tips: Hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg, keep core stable

Superman.form_tips: Lie prone, lift arms and legs simultaneously, squeeze lower back

V-up.form_tips: Lie back, simultaneously lift arms and legs to meet, lower with control

Flutter Kick.form_tips: Lie back, legs extended, alternate small kicks, lower back pressed down

Scissor Kick.form_tips: Lie back, legs elevated, cross legs alternately, core engaged

Toe Touch.form_tips: Lie back, legs up, reach hands to toes, lower with control

Windshield Wiper.form_tips: Lie back, legs up, rotate side to side, control the movement

Ab Wheel Rollout.form_tips: Kneel, roll wheel forward, keep core tight, return to start

Pallof Press.form_tips: Stand sideways to cable, press out, resist rotation, control return

Wood Chop.form_tips: Cable high, pull diagonally down, rotate torso, control movement

Treadmill.form_tips: Natural gait, upright posture, moderate stride, consistent pace

Cycling.form_tips: Proper seat height, smooth pedal stroke, engage core

Rowing.form_tips: Legs first, then lean back, pull to chest, smooth sequence

Elliptical.form_tips: Upright posture, push through heels, smooth motion, engage arms

Jump Rope.form_tips: Small wrist circles, jump on balls of feet, elbows in

Stair Climber.form_tips: Stand upright, full step on each stair, don't lean on rails

Sprint.form_tips: Explosive acceleration, drive knees high, pump arms, lean forward

Sled Push.form_tips: Low body angle, drive through legs, steady push, core engaged

Sled Pull.form_tips: Pull with arms, walk backward, maintain tension, core tight

Medicine Ball Slam.form_tips: Overhead position, explosive slam down, catch on bounce

Wall Ball.form_tips: Squat low, explosive throw to target, catch and repeat

Tire Flip.form_tips: Deadlift position, drive hips forward, press tire over
